Delia Reyna F. is 60 years old.  She lives in the town of San Martín, in San Salvador department.  She lives with her husband and they both work hard to get ahead in life.  Delia owns a store where she sells men's, women's and children's clothes.  She sells both used and new clothes.  She also sells body creams, hair creams, cosmetics and shoes.

Delia has been in this business for fourteen and a half years and her business has grown little by little with a lot of hard work.  She is requesting a loan so that she has the money she needs to buy a larger quantity of new and used clothes.  She would also like to buy shoes and cosmetics which are what she sells the most of.

loans.use: To buy clothes and cosmetics to sell

loans.name: Heriberta

texts.es: Heriberta R. F. de 52 años de edad, es una persona muy trabajadora, la cual vela por el bienestar de su pequeña nieta de 8 años de edad, la cual es su mayor incentivo para seguir adelante. Ella vive junto a su nieta en la ciudad de Nueva San Salvador, ubicada en el departamento de La Libertad. Heriberta trabaja de forma ambulante, elaborando y comercializando tortas mejicanas. Generalmente su negocio se encuentra en las afuera de fábricas o en parques, en donde ella considera que hay mayor afluencia de personas. Heribertar con mucha ilusión de mejorar su negocio solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad de materia prima como: pan, aderezos, aguacate, jamones, carnes y otros más, los cuales le permitan elaborar más tortas. Ella ha deposita en gran forma sus esperanzas de mejorar en dicho préstamo, a través del cual espera salir adelante.
texts.en:
Heriberta R. F. is 52 years old.  She is a very hard-working person who looks out for the well-being of her 8 year-old granddaughter who is her biggest incentive to keep working.  She lives with her granddaughter in the city of Nueva San Salvador, in La Libertad department.  Heriberta works as a street trader, making and selling 'tortas mejicanas' (a type of sandwich).

Generally Heriberta makes her sales outside factories or in parks where she considers there to be a large number of people.  Heriberta has a great desire to improve her business.  She is requesting a loan so that she can buy more ingredients such as bread, dressings, avocados, ham, meat, etc. which will allow her to make more sandwiches.  She has placed a lot of hope in improving her business with this loan and she hopes to use it to get ahead.

loans.use: To buy ingredients for making her sandwiches

location.town: Nueva San Salvador, departamento de La Libertad

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Seeds and fertilizers for her crops

loans.name: Noris Olimpia

texts.es: Noris Olimpia F. de 48 años de edad, reside en Colón, en el departamento de La Libertad, en donde vive junto a tres hijos quienes se dedican a estudiar, así mismo vive junto a su esposo el cual trabaja como agricultor. Noris posee una tienda de productos perecederos, la cual esta ubicada en su casa de habitación, negocio el cual le permite contar con todo lo necesario para el hogar y sus familia, es por esta razón que ella solicita un préstamo a través del cual pueda  contar con el dinero necesario para equipar su negocio con todo lo necesario para brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes, ya que en muchas ocasiones se ve obligada a perder algunas ventas, ya que no posee los productos que le solicitan, circunstancias las cuales ella desea poder cambiar, para mejorar y salir adelante con su negocio, así mismo desea poder comprar productos de temporada como: tortas de frutas, adornos navideños, chocolates, entre otros más. Noris es una señora muy visionaria quien siempre desea salir adelante e ir creciendo día con día por el bienestar de ella y su hogar, ya que para ella es muy importante poder aportar a su casa y de esta forma poder vivir de una manera tranquila en la cual pueda contar con todo lo necesario para sus hijos, su esposo y ella.
texts.en:
Noris Olimpia F. is 48 years old.  She lives in Colón, in La Libertad department together with her three children who are all studying.  She also lives with her husband who works as a farmer.  Noris owns a store where she sells perishable products.  Her store is located in her home.  Her business allows her to have everything she needs for her household and her family.

Noris is requesting a loan which will provide her with the money she needs to equip her business with everything she needs to provide a better service to her customers since she often loses sales because she doesn't have the products that her customers are requesting.  These are circumstances which she would like to change in order to improve her business and move it forwards.  She would also like to buy seasonal products such as fruit cakes, Christmas decorations, chocolates, etc.  Noris is a very visionary woman who always wants to get ahead in life and grow from day to day for her own well-being and that of her household.  It is very important to her to be able to support her household and thereby live more calmly and have everything she, her husband and her children need.

loans.use: To buy perishable products

loans.name: Mili

texts.en:
Mili chose a challenging time to start up his business, ‘Yes V Can’: “I registered the company at City Hall on a rainy Friday the 13th in February of 2009,” he describes. 

Despite his launching the business at the height of the recession, Yes V Can is growing. Mili explains that an old saying – “Greatness requires the taking of risks. That is why so few ever achieve it,” – inspires him to take on the challenges of owning a small business. Yes V Can provides copying, printing, binding, and other services for large construction projects, and Mili’s signs - like those used to indicate projects that have received American Recovery Reinvestment Act funding - can be seen around the San Francisco Bay Area.

Mili prides himself on thinking outside the box to keep prices low. Recently, he successfully out-bid a large corporation for a banner project in San Francisco’s Bayview neighborhood, where his shop is located. While the corporation sought to lower prices by purchasing metal brackets made in China, Mili employed an acquaintance to turn out the brackets locally. Mili kept the job local, and his fixtures were cheaper and stronger. 

Looking forward, Mili would like to be a ‘one-stop shop’ for all construction companies and walk-in customers who need his services. “Finding customers and building trust is the difficult part,” he explains. “Once I find them, I want to progress through the project with the customer.” 

When Mili started Yes V Can he needed a large format printer, but without an established credit history he was unable to qualify for a loan from his bank or leasing company. Mili rented the machine from a competitor but was charged a crippling fee that was 400% above market rate. Fortunately, he was recently presented with the chance to buy his own machine and came to his local MFI, Opportunity Fund, for financing. 

“I was in a quandary over what to do. Then I heard about Opportunity Fund, and within 2 weeks I was approved for a loan. This is a really good thing.” A $5,000 loan will cover the cost of two used printers, which will allow him to take on more jobs, be more cost-effective, and grow his business. In the near future, he plans to hire an employee to help manage his increasing workload. 

Ultimately, Mili’s goal is to help and hire from his community. “It’s through the community that I’ve been able to do this so far – showing gratitude and giving back is very important. That’s how I was raised by my parents, and I want to live by their example so my children will do the same when it is time for them to face the world!”

loans.use: Cover the cost of two used printers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy plants to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: For seeds, manure and fertilizer.

loans.name: Lorena Rubia

texts.es: Lorena Rubia C. D. P. D. 34 años D. edad, es una madre D. familia muy responsable y trabajadora, la cual se esfuerza por sacar adelante a sus 5 hijos, todos menores D. edad, quienes se dedican a estudiar. Ella posee una venta D. tortillas, negocio el cual en este país es muy rentable por el hecho que las tortillas son parte D. la dieta diaria D. las personas, razón por la cual se venden mucho. Lorena es una persona muy trabajadora y dedicada a su familia, la cual se esfuerza a diario por brindarles lo mejor y D. esta manera solventar los gastos del hogar y también pagar los estudios D. sus hijos, lo cual es D. mucha importancia para Lorena. Ella solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad D. maíz D. manera que pueda contar con más materia prima para la elaboración D. su producto y así contar con más ganancias.
texts.en:
Lorena Rubia C. D. P. is 34 years old.  She is a very responsible and hard-working mother who works hard to get her 5 dependent children, who all study, ahead in life.

Lorena owns a tortilla business.  In this country this is a very profitable business because tortillas are a staple part of people's daily diet, so they sell really well.  Lorena is a very hard-working person and committed to her family.  She works hard every day to proviD. her family with the best, cover household expenses and pay for her children's education which is very important to her.  She is requesting a loan with which she can buy more corn so that she can have more ingredients for making her tortillas and, consequently, more profits.

loans.use: To buy corn, cheese, beans and fried pork rinds for making her tortillas and pupusas

location.town: Ciudad Arce en el departamento de La Libertad

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy seeds, manure and fertilizer

loans.name: Blanca Miriam

texts.es: Blanca Miriam G. D. S. D. 56 años D. edad, vive junto a su esposo y dos hijos menores D. edad, junto a los cuales resiD. en Tonacatepeque, en el departamento D. San Salvador. Ella es una señora la cual trabaja para sostener su hogar y sus necesidades personales, se dedica a la venta D. ropa para mujeres, niños y hombres, su venta se encuentra sobre la calle principal D. Tonacatepeque, un lugar en el cual cuenta con una ubicación muy buena debido a que las personas que se dirigen hacia el mercado pasan enfrente D. su puesto y así mismo esta calle es una D. las vías principales D. acceso por lo que es muy transitado. Blanca cuenta con muy buenas ventas por lo que desea aumentar su inventario, sobre todo comprar mayor cantidad D. pantalones y blusas para mujer, los cuales son los que más venD.. Es por esta razón que ella solicita un préstamo a Integral por medio del cual pueda lograr lo anterior, esto lo hace con el gran deseo D. mejorar sus ventas y D. esta forma vivir D. una forma más estable junto a su familia.
texts.en:
Blanca Miriam G. D. S. is 56 years old.  She lives with her husband and two dependent children in Tonacatepeque, in San Salvador department.  She works to support her household and to cover her personal needs.  She sells women's, children's and men's clothes.  She makes her sales on the main street of Tonacatepeque.  She has a very good location because people heading to the market pass right in front of her stall.  This street is also one of the main routes of access to the city which means that it is very busy.

Blanca has very good sales and so would like to increase her inventory.  Above all she would like to buy more women's pants and blouses which are what she sells the most of.  For this reason, she is requesting a loan from Integral which will help her to achieve her goal.  She does this with a great desire to improve her sales and thereby live in a more stable manner with her family.

loans.use: To buy clothes to increase her inventory

loans.name: Deysi Del Carmen

texts.es: Deysi del Carmen C. N. de 30 años de edad, es madre soltera de dos niños de 7 y 11 años de edad, junto a los cuales reside en Cojutepeque, en el departamento de Cuscatlán. Con el deseo de poder vivir mejor, desde hace 5 años y medio que Deysi inició su propio negocio el cual es una tienda de productos perecederos, la cual esta ubicada en su casa de habitación. Deysi atiende el negocio de lunes a domingo, su faena inicia cada día a las 6 de la mañana y termina a las 10 de la noche, a pesar que su trabajo es pesado ya que debe atender clientes a lo largo del día, le permite estar en su casa y así mismo vender con sus vecinos los cuales la conocen desde hace mucho tiempo atrás. Es por esto que ella solicita un préstamo a través del cual pueda invertir comprando mayor cantidad de productos de primera necesidad, sobre todo  bebidas frías, y de esta manera mejorar sus ventas para brindarles una mejor vida a sus dos pequeños hijos.
texts.en: Deysi del Carmen C. N., 30, is a single mother with two children aged 7 and 11 years old.  She lives with them in Cojutepeque, in the department of Cuscatlán.  Five and a half years ago, Deysi started her own business selling perishable goods in the hopes that it would allow her to live better.  The store is located in her house and Deysi tends to her business from Monday to Sunday.  She starts her first chore each day at 6 in the morning and finishes at 10 at night.  Although her work is heavy since she has to tend to customers all day long, it allows her to be at her house and likewise, to sell to her neighbors, who she has known for a long time.  This is why she is requesting a loan through which she will be able to buy a greater quantity of staple products -- above all cold drinks -- in order to improve her sales and offer her two small children a better life.

loans.use: to buy staple items

location.town: Cojutepeque en el departamento de Cuscatlán

loans.name: Mercedes De La Cruz

texts.es:
Mercedes De La Cruz  S. L.  tiene 50 años. Es soltera vive con los hijos, vive en el cantón de Chillanes en la Provincia de Bolívar. Tiene 5 hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. SAN MIGUELITO se encuentra ubicada 90 minutos de la Oficina Chillanes, perteneciente al cantón Chillanes, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, platano, naranja, mangos y naranja, esta actividad llevan mucho tiempo haciéndolo.

Mercedes se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, platano, naranja, mangos y naranja . Compra sus productos en Matilde Esther y los vende en la feria de Chillanes y en el mismo recinto.

Solicita el crédito para la comprar de semillas para los cultivos y abonos y fertilizantes para las semillas cultivadas, platano, naranja, mangos y naranja. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es seguir aumentando el negocio..

Le gustaría cocinar peinar a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Mercedes De La Cruz S. L. is 50 years old.  She is single and lives with her children in Chillanes canton, in Bolívar province.  She has 5 children.

The San Miguelito solidarity group is located 90 minutes from the Chillanes office, in Chillanes canton.  This group works on short-cycle agricultural tasks such as growing corn, bananas, oranges and mangos.  They have been doing this for a long time.

Mercedes grows corn, bananas, oranges and mangos.  She buys her products in Matilde Esther and sells them in Chillanes market and district.

She is requesting this loan to buy seeds and fertilizers for her banana, orange and mango crops.  The support of this loan will help her financially to cover her needs.  She faces challenges such as insect infestations, diseases and changes in the weather.  Her dream is to continue increasing her business.

She likes to cook for her children.

loans.use: To buy seeds and fertilizers

loans.name: Alfredo Antonio

texts.es:
Alfredo de 48 años, tiene un taller de cerrajería y fabricación de muebles. Vive en una zona periurbana en el Fortín de Guayaquil caracterizada por sus caminos de tierra.  

Por la falta de oportunidades el comenzó a trabajar en el taller de cerrajería con algunos trabajos y aprendiendo poco a poco ya que investigaba para poder fabricar los muebles y así pudo mantener a sus dos hijos. En la actualidad trabaja desde las 08h00am hasta las 18h00pm con dos empleados que le ayudan en la cerrajería haciendo reparaciones de puertas, chapas, vitrinas de madera, vidrio etc.      

Con el préstamo quiere comprar maquinas, heamientas para su taller de cerrajería. En el futuro quiere tener más ingresos adecuando su negocio ya que está en la parte delantera de su casa.
texts.en:
Alfredo is 48 years old. He has a locksmith shop and a furniture making business. He lives in the suburbs of Fortin de Guayaquil, which is known for its dirt roads.
Since he was lacking in opportunities, he began working in a locksmith shop with some jobs. He began to learn, little by little, as he was curious, how to make furniture. This is how he is able to support his two children. Actually, he works from 8:00am until 6:00pm. He has two employees that help him with the locksmith shop. They repair doors, veneers, showcases, glass, etc.  
With this loan he would like to buy machines and tools for his locksmith shop. In the future he would like to have sufficient earnings from his business in order to improve the front of his house.

loans.use: machines and tools

loans.name: Lourdes Elizabeth

texts.es:
Lourdes de 23 años,(en la foto esta en una peluqueria ofreciendo sus productos) es comerciante informal de venta de ropa y cosméticos. Vive con su hijo en una zona urbana llamada Orquídeas porque en su descubrimiento descubrieron muchas flores y en la actualidad hay un parque de estas flores.  

Ella tuvo que conseguir una actividad económica para general dinero y así poder mantener a su hijo. Fue entonces que decidió invertir sus ahorros en ropa y cosméticos para venderlo a sus vecinos y conocidos. Poco a poco con esfuerzo ella ahora tiene una cartera de clientes definida a quienes les reparte la ropa y  cosméticos. Tiene distintos horarios de trabajo y en ocasiones da crédito para vender los cosméticos.

Para seguir con la venta de su mercadería ella quiere comprar ropa y cosméticos para incrementar su capital de trabajo. En el futuro quiere incrementar su mercadería.
texts.en:
Lourdes is 23 years old. In this photo she is in the beauty parlor selling her products. She is a roving businesswoman who sells clothes and cosmetics. She lives with her son in a city called Orquidas (Orchids) because when the city was discovered there were a lot of flowers there. They now have a park with these varieties of flowers.
Lourdes had to find a way to make money in order to support her son. This is why she decided to invest her savings in clothes and cosmetics. She has different work hours and, at times, she gives out credit in order to sell her cosmetics.
In order to continue to sell her merchandise she would like to buy more clothes and cosmetics in order to increase her working capital. In the future she would like to increase her inventory.

loans.use: Cosmetics, clothes

loans.name: Kristall Group

texts.es:
Este grupo se llama Krystal, porque en la comunidad hace mucho frio y todas las mañanas amanecen los árboles cristalizados. Está ubicado en el Estado de Puebla en México.  El grupo está conformado por 9 integrantes.

Matilde Melina H. R. Tiene 33 años, estudió hasta la preparatoria y es panadera. Ella tiene en total 2 hijos; 1 mujer y 1 varón.  Matilde se dedica a la elaboración de pan que inició hace 6 años. Solicita el préstamo para comprar materia prima para complacer los pedidos de clientes, los vecinos y clientes de ella comentan que están satisfechos con la compra de pan y que es muy rico, les encantan los roles es lo que más vende, la preferencia de clientes a su negocio es por la limpieza y el buen sabor,  el negocio está a la entrada de la comunidad por ello sus ventas ella comenta son cada vez más buenas.  Al momento de solicitar este préstamo se siente feliz.   Quiere este crédito para comprar lo necesario en azúcar, harina, huevo, saborizantes entre otros para cumplir con los pedidos que hasta ahora tiene por las fechas que se acercan de posadas navideñas para la noche buena y navidad, con ello también garantiza ya los pedidos de rosca de reyes en enero. Ella desea darles una vida y educación digna a sus hijos ya que no tiene apoyo del padre de ellos quien los abandono hace 10 años, desea salir adelante como hasta ahora y seguir siendo el orgullo y buen ejemplo de sus hijos.
texts.en:
This group is called "Krystal" because it is so cold in their community that every morning, they wake up to find the trees crystallized with ice.  They are located in the Mexican state of Puebla.  The group is made up of 9 members.

Matilde Melina H. R. is 33 years old, studied until high school, and is a bread maker.  In total, she has 2 children: one girl and one boy.  Matilde has been making bread for 6 years.  She is requesting a loan to buy ingredients so that she can accommodate all of her customers' orders.  Her neighbors and customers say that they are very pleased to buy bread from her and that it is very tasty.  They love her rolls, which is what she sells the most of.  Customers prefer her business due to its cleanliness and for the good flavor of her breads.  Matilde's business is at the entrance to the community and for this reason, she says her sales are improving consistently.

At the moment, as she requests this loan, Matilde feels happy.  She wants this loan to buy necessary items like sugar, flour, egg, flavorings, and other ingredients, in order to fill the orders she has so far for the upcoming holidays of Las Posadas [a nine-day celebration leading up to Christmas], Christmas Eve, and Christmas.  She has also promised orders already for the Epiphany celebration in January.

Matilde hopes to give her children a life and education of dignity, as she does not have the support of their father, who abandoned them 10 years ago.  She hopes to continue moving forward like she has so far, and to continue to be proud and a good example for her children.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and invest in her breadmaking business

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
Ali is a 28-year-old single man from Bint Jbeil, working in construction since 2004 on his own account with 9 years of experience. He specializes in cement. Ali is requesting a loan for the first time from A. Majmoua in order to buy a cement mixer necessary for his business.  This blender/mixer eases his work a lot and makes more work in less time. 

Ali is recommended by his neighbors and friends, they believe he’s a hard worker. Ali is committed to his clients and is true to his word.  He hopes to open a construction company that can help him in making a small happy family.

loans.use: To buy a cement mixer

loans.name: Abbass

texts.en:
Abbass is a 38-year-old married man and is a father to three kids. Abbass has been selling numerous useful things such as combs, nails, hammers, etc. for three years. He doesn’t own a shop or a car, he uses a taxi to sell his products. 

Abbass is requesting a loan from Al Majmoua in order to buy a Renault RAPID car necessary for his business.  Abbass has a good reputation.  He’s also a smart businessman. He hopes to expand his business to wholesale in the future.

loans.use: To buy car for business

loans.name: Rosario De Los Ángeles

texts.es: Rosario D. Los Ángeles C. D. C. D. 50 años D. edad, resiD. en el municipio D. Soyapango, en donD. vive junto a su esposo el cual es empleado D. una empresa privada y así mismo vive junto a dos hijos D. 10 y 11 años D. edad.  Rosario posee su propio negocio en el cual comercializa tostadas D. yuca y D. plátano, dulces, galletas, agua, jugos, popcorn y otros más. Su negocio esta ubicado frente a una D. las iglesias más grandes D. San Salvador y la cual posee mayor cantidad D. feligreses, por lo que sus ventas son bastante estables. Rosario solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda surtir sus productos comprando mayor cantidad D. estos y D. esta forma atender a más clientes, los cuales en su mayoría conocen  muy bien a Rosario y son muy fieles con ella.
texts.en:
Rosario D. Los Ángeles C. D. C., age 50, resides in the town of Soyapango. She lives with her husband, who is employed at a private company, and their two children (ages 10 and 11). Rosario has a business selling cassava and plantain chips, candy, cookies, water, juices, popcorn, and other items. Her business is located in front of one of the largest churches in San Salvador. Since there are many parishioners who come here, her sales are quite stable.

Rosario is requesting a loan so that she can buy a large quantity of products in order serve more customers. They know her very well and are very loyal to her.

loans.use: Purchase juices, cookies, and candy to sell

loans.name: Youssef

texts.en:
Youssef is a 38-year-old married man from Bint Jbeil, and is a father of one child. Youssef has been a barber for 15 years. He’s requesting a loan from Al Majmoua in order to buy special shampoo and hair cutting chairs. He previously asked for a loan from Al Majmoua to improve his business and the loan had a good impact.  Tthis time he’s seeking the same impact. 

Youssef’s clients are his villagers, neighbors, and friends.  They say that he’s an expert in his work. He hopes to open a beauty institute in addition his barber shop to increase income.

loans.use: To buy shampoo and hair cutting chairs

loans.name: Aydee

texts.es: Aydee, de 34 años, convive con Fredy de 36 años. Ambos tienen un hijo: Jean Carlos de 8 años de edad; al que quieren y protegen en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de San Pedro de Cajas. El trabajo al que se dedica está empeñosa mujer, es la venta de productos de primera necesidad en un espacio que acondicionó en su casa, donde todos los días desde las mañanas hasta el atardecer, Aydee; vende una variedad de productos comestibles a los pobladores de su localidad. Pero como buena pobladora de San Pedro, ella también se dedica al tejido de diversas prendas de vestir a base de lana de algodón y del material dralon. Hace tan solo un año que incursionó en estos negocios, pues según afirma, antes trabajaba en la Municipalidad de Santa Ana, donde ejercía su profesión de Asistenta Social, pero al nacer su hijo, se dedicó de lleno a su crianza; es así que ahora con el trascurrir de los años, ella quiere ampliar su negocio y retomar el ejercicio de su profesión. Es el segundo crédito con MFP, y como integrante de la junta directiva de su banco comunal, asegura que trabajará con empeño y ahínco en el logro de los objetivos que se proponen como un grupo emprendedor. De conseguir el crédito, está pensando invertir en la mejora de su tienda comprando mercadería para surtir su negocio.
texts.en:
Aydee is 34 years old and lives with Fredy, age 36. They have an eight year old son named Jean Carlos who they love and protect in their own home located in the town of San Pedro de Cajas. Aydee is an earnest woman who makes a living by selling basic necessities from a space set aside in her house. She works every day from morning to evening. Aydee sells a variety of food products to the good residents of San Pedro. She also weaves different garments made of wool, cotton, and acrylic. According to her, she started these businesses a year ago. She previously worked for the City of Santa Ana as a social worker, but after the birth of her son, she wanted to dedicate herself full-time to raising him. Now that the years have passed, she wants to expand her business and return to her job.

This is her second loan with MFP. As a board member of her Communal Bank, she is determined to work hard to help her group achieve their goals as entrepreneurs. Upon receiving this loan, Aydee will invest in improvements to her store such as buying merchandise to restock her inventory.

loans.use: Restock her store with various products

loans.name: Felicita

texts.es: Felicita M. D. R. D. 47 años D. edad, resiD. en el municipio D. Soyapango en el departamento D. San Salvador, ella vive junto a su esposo y dos hijos los cuales se dedican a estudiar. Felicita tiene como profesión el ser costurera, ella se encarga D. confeccionar ropa formal, uniformes y ropa casual, ella es alguien muy detallista quien desarrolla un trabajo muy bueno, lo que le permite contar con la fidelidad D. muchos clientes como familiares, amigos y vecinos, ya que la responsabilidad es una D. las mejorar cualidades D. ella. Felicita elabora trabajos por encargo y así mismo elabora prendas D. vestir para vender en su casa D. habitación, donD. también se dedica a elaborar su trabajo. Felicita solicita un préstamo con el fin D. poder comprar telas en diferentes colores y estampados, así mismo comprar hilo, agujas y todo lo necesario para elaborar la ropa, Felicita posee la certeza q D. esta manera su negocio podrá mejorar y así obtener mayores ganancias las cuales sean D. beneficio para su hogar.
texts.en:
Felicita M. D. R. is 47 years old and resides in the town of Soyapango in the Department of San Salvador. She lives with her husband and two children who are in school. Felicita works as a seamstress and is in charge of designing formalwear, uniforms, and casual clothes. She is known as someone who is detailed at developing a good product. This has allowed her to accumulate many loyal customers such as relatives, friends, and neighbors. Responsibility is one of her best qualities.

Felicita works according to orders and produces the garments that she sells in her home. She is requesting a loan in order to buy fabrics in different colors and patterns, thread, needles, and everything else she needs for making clothes. Felicita has confidence that her business can improve and generate more revenue that will benefit her household.

loans.use: Purchase fabric, thread, needles, and other sewing supplies

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase fruit & honey to sell

loans.name: Carmen Domitila

texts.es:
Carmen de 47 años, tiene un puesto en donde vende juguetes, luces, accesorios. Vive con su hijo en una zona urbana llamada Orquídeas porque en su descubrimiento descubrieron muchas flores y en la actualidad hay un parque de estas flores.  

Comenzó a vender juguetes por unidad para tener su propio negocio poco a poco con esfuerzo y con la motivación de mantener a su hijo ya que es madre soltera comenzó con un puesto a vender juguetes, luces, accesorios etc. Poco a poco incremento su mercadería, ahora trabaja desde las 07h00am hasta las 14h00pm todo los días. Vende las luces de navidad a $ 2.25, juguetes a $ 2.00, vasos a $ 0.60 c/u. Una de las complicaciones que a veces se presenta son las enfermedades. 

Con el préstamo quiere comprar juguetes y luces para la época de natividad que es cuando mas se vende. En el futuro quiere incrementa la mercadería y tener su local propio.
texts.en:
Carmen, age 47, has a vending stand where she sells toys, lights, and accessories. She lives with her son in an urban area called Orquídeas that was named after the many flowers that existed upon its discovery. There is now a park where orchids continue to grow.

Carmen began selling individual toys as way of having her own business. With a little effort and the motivation of supporting her son as a single mother, she opened a vending stand where she sells toys, lights, accessories, and other items. She gradually increased her inventory and now works every day from 7am to 2pm. Carmen sells Christmas lights for $2.25, toys for $2.00, and glasses for $0.60/each. One of the difficulties she faces is combating illness.

With this loan Carmen wants to buy toys and lights for the Christmas season, the time when she sells the most. In the future she wants to increase her inventory of merchandise and open her own store.

loans.use: Purchase toys & Christmas lights

loans.name: Orlando

texts.es: El señor Orlando, se dedica a ofrecer los servicios de molino. Esta no es la primera vez que realiza financiamientos. El siempre ha demostrado ser una persona muy tranquila y trabajadora la mayoría de clientes de Orlando le solicitan este servicio porque es muy solicitado para moler maíz, pinol, pinolillo entre otras cosas. Es una persona muy emprendedora y tiene todas las ganas de salir adelante.
texts.en: Sr. Orlando has a business in which he provides milling services.  This is not the first time he has accessed a loan.  He has always demonstrated that he is a peaceful and hardworking individual.  Most of Orlando’s customers request his services because they need to grind corn for making “pinol”, “pinolillo” (both are traditional beverages made with cornmeal), and other items.  He is an enterprising person who has all the desire to succeed.

loans.use: Operating capital for providing milling services

loans.name: Claudia Maricela

texts.es: Claudia Maricela G. R. de 25 años de edad, es una joven madre de un pequeño de 2 años de edad, así mismo vive junto a su esposo en el departamento de La Unión, en donde posee su propio negocio, el cual es muy importante para ella debido a que le permite brindarle ayuda económica a su esposo. Claudia se dedica a vender ropa interior femenina, así mismo comercializa calcetines para bebés y ganchos para el cabello, el negocio esta ubicado en el mercado regional de La Unión, y ella es muy conocida por diferentes personas. Claudia solicita un préstamo a través del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad de ropa, en diferentes tallas y colores, esto lo hace con el deseo de poder obtener mayor cantidad de clientes y así percibir más ganancias, lo cual es muy importante para Claudia ya que el sueldo de su esposo es bastante bajo para solventar todos los gastos del hogar, razón por la cual Claudia se esfuerza mucho por mejorar su negocio.
texts.en:
Claudia Maricela G. R., age 25, is a young mother of a two year old child. She and her husband live in the Department of La Unión where she has her own business. This enterprise is very important because it enables her to help her husband with the finances. Claudia sells women’s undergarments, baby socks, and hairclips. Her business is located at the regional market of La Unión and she is well-known among various people.

Claudia is requesting a loan in order to buy a large quantity of clothing in various sizes and colors. She hopes to attract more customers and generate additional income. This is very important to Claudia because her husband’s salary is not enough to cover all of the household expenses. For this reason, Claudia works hard to improve her business.

loans.use: Purchase undergarments & hair accessories

loans.name: Dora Emma

texts.es: Dora Emma C. D. R. D. 39 años D. edad, resiD. en la ciudad D. Panchimalco, en el departamento San Salvador, en donD. vive junto a su esposo quien trabaja como mecánico, y así mismo junto a cuatro hijos menores D. edad quienes se dedican a estudiar. Dora posee una tienda en la cual comercializa productos D. primera necesidad, contando con muy buena clientela ya que es la única tienda en el lugar. Así mismo comercializa granos básicos y verduras. Dora solicita un préstamo a través del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad D. productos D. primera necesidad, sobre todo aquellos que cuentan con más demanda por parte D. las personas. Con el préstamo hecho a Integral ella alberga la esperanza D. poder mejorar las ventas D. su negocio, y D. esta manera contar con más ganancias las cuales le permitan brindarle todo lo necesario a su familia.
texts.en:
Dora Emma C. D. R., age 39, resides in the city of Panchimalco in the Department of San Salvador. She lives with her husband who works as a mechanic and their four young children who are in school. Dora has a store where she sells basic necessities. She has a good customer base since she is the only store in the area. In addition, she sells grains and vegetables.

Dora is requesting a loan in order to buy a large quantity of basic necessities, especially those products for which people have great demand. With this loan provided by Apoyo Integral, she hopes to improve her business sales in order to have more money to proviD. everything her family needs.

loans.use: Purchase food products for her store

loans.name: Luis Walberto

texts.es: Luis Walberto N. S. de 36 años de edad, es una persona muy trabajadora y dedicada al bienestar de su hogar. Vive junto a una hermana y un sobrino, en San Martín, ubicado en el departamento de San Salvador. Luis posee una venta de productos plásticos como canastas, masetas en diferentes tamaños, recipientes para colocar comida, recipientes grandes para colocar agua los cuales en El Salvador son llamados “guacales”, así mismo comercializa hoyas y cacerolas. Su negocio esta ubicado en el mercado municipal de San Martín, lugar en el cual cuenta con muchos clientes. Es por esto que Luis desea poder aumentar sus productos, ya que las ganancias de este negocio son las que le permiten contar con todo lo necesario para tener una vida digna. Él solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad de productos plásticos y así mismo más cacerolas.
texts.en:
Luis Walberto N. S. is 36 years old and a hardworking individual who is dedicated to the welfare of his household. He lives with a sister and a nephew in San Martín, which is located in the Department of San Salvador. Luis has a store where he sells plastic products such as crates, flowerpots in different sizes, food storage containers, and large water receptacles called “guacales” in El Salvador. He also sells pots and pans. His business is located at the municipal market in San Martín, a place where there are many customers. For this reason, Luis wants to increase his inventory of products. The profits from this business provide him with everything he needs to have a decent life.

The loan he is requesting will be used to buy a large quantity of plastic goods as well as more pans.

loans.use: Purchase plastic goods & pans to sell

loans.name: María Yesenia

texts.es: María Yesenia D. P. G. D. 28 años D. edad, resiD. en el departamento D. San Salvador junto a su familia la cual esta conformada por su esposo y dos hijos menores D. edad. María posee una venta D. papas fritas y fruta pelada y cortada en trocitos, el negocio esta ubicado sobre calle principal y se encuentra frente a una universidad, lo cual es muy beneficioso para ella, ya que muchos D. los estudiantes D. dicho centro educativo consumen sus productos. María solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda comprar papas por mayor, así mismo diferentes tipos D. frutas D. estación. María es una persona muy responsable, quien vela por el bienestar D. su familia, por lo que cuenta con el enorme deseo D. mejorar sus ventas y D. esta forma brindarles una vida mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en:
María Yesenia D. P. G. is 28 years old and resides in the Department of San Salvador with her family, which consists of her husband and two young children. She has a vending stand where she sells French fries and fruit that has been peeled and sliced. Her business is located along the main street in front of a university, which is very beneficial for her. Many students come by to eat her food.

María is requesting a loan in order to buy potatoes in bulk, as well as different types of seasonal fruit. She is a very responsible person who is always looking out for the welfare of her family. For this reason, she has a strong desire to improve her sales and proviD. a better life for her children.

loans.use: Purchase potatoes & fruit in bulk

loans.name: Bella Raquel

texts.es: Bella Raquel M. C. de 31 años de edad, reside en Santa Tecla, en el departamento de San Salvador, vive junto a su esposo y dos hijos de: 13 y 2 años de edad. Bella posee una tortillería, en la cual se encarga de elaborar y vender tortillas, las cuales son muy vendidas, así mismo comercializa pupusas, el plato típico más conocido y vendido de este país. Ella es una madre de familia muy responsable, quien trabaja muy duro para sacar adelante a sus hijos. Bella solicita un préstamo a través del cual pueda comprar maíz en grandes cantidades, queso frijoles, chicharrón,  así mismo comprar cilindros de gas propano, de manera que pueda contar con mucha materia prima para la elaboración y cocción de las tortillas y pupusas.
texts.en:
Bella Raquel M. C. is 31 years old and resides in Santa Tecla, Department of San Salvador. She lives with her husband and two children, ages 13 and 2. Bella has a tortilla shop where she in charge of making and selling tortillas, which are in high demand. She also prepares “pupusas” a well-known traditional dish that is sold throughout the country. Bella is a responsible mother who works extremely hard so that her children can get ahead.

She is requesting a loan in order to buy corn in large quantities, cheese, beans, pork, and cylinders of propane gas. This will allow her to have plenty of supplies for preparing and cooking tortillas and pupusas.

loans.use: Purchase ingredients in bulk & propane gas

location.town: Santa Tecla, departamento de La Libertad

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy shoes

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy basic household products

loans.name: Gladys Angelica

texts.es: Gladys Angelica Z. de 33 años de edad, reside en el municipio de San Marcos, en donde vive junto a su esposo y junto a dos hijos de 12 y 11 años de edad, los cuales se dedican a estudiar. Gladys posee su propia panadería, en la cual se encarga de elaborar el pan y posteriormente comercializar tanto en su casa, lugar en el cual esta ubicada la panadería, como a sus clientes, a los cuales debe ir a repartir el pan. Cuenta con el beneficio de poseer muchos clientes los que hacen pedido en grandes cantidades y que son fieles a su negocio. Gladys solicita un préstamo a través del cual pueda comprar harina por mayor para poder obtenerla más barata, así como también manteca, azúcar, levadura y otros productos más los cuales son muy importantes para la realización del pan. A pesar que salir adelante con su negocio ha sido bastante difícil, ella ha sabido mantenerse firme con el deseo de crecer como micro empresaria y así brindarles un mejor futuro a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Gladys Angelica Z. is 33 years old.  She lives in the town of San Marcos together with her husband and two children aged 12 and 11 who are in school.

Gladys owns her own bakery where she makes bread.  She sells the bread from her home, which is where her bakery is located, and she also delivers it to her customers.  Gladys has many customers who make large orders and who are loyal to her business.

She is requesting a loan so that she can buy flour wholesale so that she can obtain it more cheaply.  She will also buy butter, sugar, yeast and other products which are important for making bread.  In spite of the fact that getting ahead in her business has been quite difficult, Gladys has known how to stick to her desire to grow as a small businesswoman and thereby provide her children with a better future.

loans.use: To buy ingredients for making bread

location.town: San Marcos, departamento de San Salvador

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: María, de 35 años, convive con Silvio, de 37 años. Ambos tienen 3 hijos: Marco, de 11, María, de 9 y Laura, de 5 años. En unión familiar ellos conviven en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de San Pedro de Cajas. Con la singular alegría que la caracteriza, María, nos cuenta que hace 11 años que se dedica a la artesanía. Donde teje, tapices, alfombras y demás prendas de vestir a base de lana y madejas de hilo de algodón. Según menciona, los hermosos tejidos con motivos paisajísticos, son comprados por los intermediarios que constantemente visitan el lugar; cuyos productos los lleva a diversos lugares del Perú y del país como: Argentina, Ecuador. Por ello para más adelante está pensando abrir una tienda comercial en la “galería turística”, de su localidad. Es el segundo crédito con MFP, y como buena integrante de su banco comunal, es empeñosa y dedicada en los pagos que realiza, como también agradece el apoyo que constante que recibe de parte de ellos. De obtener el crédito, invertirá en la compra de varias madejas de lana, de diferentes colores, ya que tienen que entregar un pedido de gorras y chompas al país de Argentina.
texts.en:
María is 35 years old.  She lives with her partner Silvio who is 37.  They have 3 children: Marco who is 11, María who is 9, and 5 year-old Laura.  They live together in their own home which is in the town of San Pedro de Cajas.  With the cheerfulness that characterizes her, María tells us that she has been in the handicraft business for 11 years.  She weaves tapestries, rugs and clothes from wool and skeins of cotton thread.  María says that her beautiful weavings of landscape pictures are bought by middlemen who constantly visit her area.  Her products are taken to different places in Peru and also to Argentina and Ecuador.  For this reason, in the future she is thinking of opening a store in the 'tourist mall' in her town.

This is María's second loan with MFP and as a good member of her community bank she is determined and committed to making her payments on time.  She is also grateful for the constant support that she receives.  She will use her loan to invest in buying several skeins of wool in different colors since she has an order for caps and sweaters to deliver to Argentina.

loans.use: To buy different colored wool

loans.name: Santa Rosita Group

texts.es:
Margarita G. C., 40 años D. edad, viuda, 2 hijos, socia del grupo comunal "Santa Rosita" (En la foto Margarita es la cuarta señora D. la izquierda, viste D. pantalon negro y un mandil color blanco).
Margarita pertenece al comedor popular en el Asentamiento Humano Juan Parra del Riego en El Tambo, y este comedor funciona en su domicilio que ella misma atienD., cocinando y sirviendo a los comensales y cuenta con ayuda D. su mamà. Luego D. esta actividad que termina por las tardes, Margarita a partir D. las 4pm se dedica a la venta D. "anticuchos" en la puerta D. su casa. 
La tensiòn D. estos dos trabajos hacen que Margarita siempre este agitaba y con dolores D. cabeza; pues ella es consiente que debe cumplir con estas obligaciones; puesto que ella es papà y mamà para sus hijos.
Margarita quedò viuda cuando sus hijos eran aùn muy pequeños, y tuvo que desempeñar màs D. un trabajo a la vez; hasta que tuvo la decisiòn D. generar sus propios ingresos con la venta D. comida en su hogar. 
La idea D. atender las 2 jornadas D. trabajo en su casa, fue a raìz D. que uno D. sus hijos tenìa problemas D. aprendizaje en la escuela; pues con los anteriores trabajos que Margarita desempeñaba la ausentaban D. casa por casi todo el dìa. Hoy en dìa Margarita està con sus hijos el mayor tiempo posible, para apoyarlos con sus tareas, para atenderlos y alimentarlos.
El prèstamo serà para aumento D. capital D. trabajo.
texts.en:
Margarita G. C., 40 years old, widowed, with two children, is a member of the community group "Santa Rosita" (in the picture Margarita is the fourth lady on the left, dressed in black pants and a white apron).
Margarita belongs to the soup kitchen in the settlement Juan Parra del Riego in El Tambo. She runs this kitchen at home and she takes care of it herself, cooking and serving the guests with the help of her mother. After closing the kitchen in the afternoon, she sells brochettes from the door of her house.  The stress of running two activities makes that Margarita is always nervous and suffers of headache, as she is aware that this is her obbligation as single parent. 
Margarita lost the father of her children when they were still very young, and had to have more than one job at a time, until she decided to create her own business to sell food at home.
The idea of having these two activities at home came when one of her children had learning problems at school, because with her previous jobs she was not at home almost the entire day.  Today Margarita can spend a lot ot time with her children, she can help them with their homeworks, take care of them and prepare their meals. She requests this loan to increase her operating funds.

loans.use: Operating funds

loans.name: David

texts.es: David, de 22 años, es un hombre soltero y trabajador, que vive junto a su papá Ricardo, de 65 alos, su mamá Nieves, de 64 años y su hermano Juan, de 25 años. Ambos viven en su casa propia ubicada en la ciudad de Tarma. Todos los días David, junto a su socio Hugo, preparan los ricos panes que los pobladores del lugar compran para el desayuno de la mañana; en la panadería que hace 6 meses abrieron. Comenzaron alquilando un horno, ya con las buenas ganancias lograron comprar una propia. Según afirma que diariamente genera una ganancia neta de 100 a 200 nuevos soles.  Por ello más adelante quiere abrir una tienda en la ciudad de Tarma y paralelamente en la localidad de Palca; como también esté joven ambicioso, desea abrir una tienda de comestibles, donde pueda vender productos de primera necesidad. Esta es el primer crédito con MFP, y como hombre joven y con muchos objetivos, desea más adelante seguir trabajando con su banco comunal, que le da muchas posibilidades para el progreso. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará una máquina batidora de masa. Con está máquina espera agilizar la masa de pan que manualmente se demora un promedio de una hora, que en comparación con la máquina solo demorará 25 minutos.
texts.en:
David, 22, is a single and hard-working man who lives with his father Ricardo, 65, his mother Nieves, 64, and his brother Juan, 25. They all live in their own house in the town of Tarma. Every day David and his partner Hugo bake the tasty loaves that the local residents buy for their morning breakfast at the baker's they opened 6 months ago. They started off by renting an oven, and with the profits obtained they managed to buy their own. He says that his daily profits are 100 to 200 soles. That's why in future he would like to open stores in the city of Tarma and the town of Palca. This ambitous young man would also like to open a grocery store to sell staples. 

This is his first loan with MFP, and as a young man with many goals he wants to continue to work with the loan group, which gives him the opportunity to advance. With the loan he will buy a dough mixer machine that will speed up the bread making process to just 25 minutes from the full hour it takes by hand.

loans.use: Buy a dough mixer machine.

loans.name: Roberth

texts.es: Roberth, D. 40 años, es un hombre soltero y trabajador, que vive en compañía D. su mamá Uldea, D. 50 años y sus hermanos; con los que vive en su casa propia ubicada en Palca. Hace más D. 20 años que se dedica a L. agricultura, donD. junto a su mamá siembra alverja, papa y maíz. Su producción es D. buena calidad, por ello en cada cosecha los comerciantes mayoristas del mercado central D. su localidad, le ofrecen buen pago por su producción. Pero como buen trabajador del campo; también trabaja como peón en los terrenos agrícolas D. los pobladores D. su localidad. Pero las ambiciones D. Roberth, es sembrar en mayores cantidades, y con las ganancias que obtiene comprar más terrenos agrícolas. Esta el segundo crédito con MFP, y como socio antiguo D. su banco comunal, asegura que seguirá trabajando por el bien D. sus integrantes. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará una bolsa D. alverja y 4 sacos D. abono, que le servirá para sembrar en su terreno agrícoL..
texts.en: Roberth is 40 years old and is a single and hardworking man.  He lives with his mother, Uldea, who is 50 years old and his siblings in a home he owns in Palca.  He has dedicated himself to agriculture for more than 20 years, planting peas, potatoes and corn along with his mother.  His production is of high quality, and for this reason, after each harvest, the wholesale buyers from his town’s central market offer him a good price for his crops.  But because he is a good farmer, he also works the lands of the settlers in his town.  Roberth’s goal is to grow greater quantities of his crops and buy more land with his earnings.  This is his second credit with MFP and as a long-standing member of his community bank, he assures that he will continue working for the well-being of its members.  He will purchase a bag of peas and four sacks of fertilizer with the loan that he is requesting.  This will allow him to plant more crops in his plot of land.

loans.use: To buy a bag of seeds to plant peas and 4 sacks of fertilizer.

loans.name: Nidia De Fatima

texts.es: Nidia De Fátima tiene mucho tiempo de trabajar con nosotros, ya que se encuentra en una fecha de bastantes pedidos. La señora aduce que algo que le ha ayudado a mantener sus pagos en tiempo y forma, es la administración que ella le brinda a su negocio. Por lo que su actividad es una mini librería en donde ofrece una gran variedad de productos para sus clientes pues siempre recibe un gran pedido. Para un futuro le gustaría mejorar las condiciones económicas de su vivienda. El financiamiento que está solicitando es para la compra de cuadernos, lápiz, hojas, entre otras cosas.
texts.en: Nidia De Fatima has worked with us for quite some time. It's now a busy time for her because she is getting lots of orders. She says that what has helped her keep up with her payments is the way she manages her business, a small bookshop offering a great variety of products to customers. She always gets lots of orders. In future she would like to improve the financial situation of her home. She is requesting the loan to buy notebooks, pencils and sheets of paper, among other things.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy sweets and beverages to supply her store. She will also buy products to prepare food.

loans.name: Nancy

texts.es: Nancy, de 32 años, convive con Vidal, de 36 años. Ambos tienen 3 hijos: Edwin, de15, Lourdes, de 13 y Magaly de 11 años. En unión familiar ellos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Palca. La siembra de alverja, papa, verdura y demás hortalizas, es su principal actividad económica. Según cuenta comenzó, a los 17 años, cuando se hizo cargo de producir el terreno agrícola que sus padres la heredaron. Pero no solo a eso se dedica está hermosa y emprendedora mujer, ella cría un número considerable de vacas; los cuales le proporciona, queso y leche. La producción de queso, le brindan de cinco a seis litros diarios; el cual vende a un promedio de 2 nuevos soles cada litro. A Nancy, según cuenta le va muy bien en la elaboración de queso, leche y en la siembra. Por ello desea intensificarse en la producción de lácteos así como desea sembrar habas. Está es el primer crédito con MFP, y como buena integrante de su banco comunal, se compromete en no defraudar el apoyo que le brindaron en este momento muy importante. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará una bolsa de semilla de alverja, que oscila entre 280 nuevos soles cada una, asimismo comprará 5 sacos de abono, para esparcirlos en sus sembríos de habas, que está sembrando y que muy pronto cosechará.
texts.en:
Nancy is 32  years old and lives with her partner, 36 year-old Vidal.  They have 3 children: 15 year-old Edwin, 13 year-old Lourdes and 11 year-old Magaly.  They live together in their own home which is in the town of Palca.  Nancy's main business activity is growing peas, potatoes, greens and other vegetables.

According to Nancy, she started this work at the age of 17 when she took charge of sowing the plot of land which she inherited from her parents.  However, this beautiful and enterprising woman doesn't just grow crops, she also raises a considerable number of cows which provide her with cheese and milk.  She gets five to six liters of milk a day from her cows which she sells for an average of 2 Peruvian soles per liter.  Nancy says that her cheese, milk and farming business is going very well.  For this reason, she would like to intensify her dairy production as well as grow some beans.

This is Nancy's first loan with MFP and as a good member of her community bank she pledges not to let down the people who are providing her with support at this very important time.  She will use her loan to buy a bag of pea seeds which cost around 280 nuevos soles each.  She will also buy 5 sacks of fertilizer to spread on her bean crops which she is sowing and which she will harvest very soon.

loans.use: To buy a bag of pea seeds and 5 sacks of fertilizer

loans.name: Gloria

texts.es: Gloria, de 31 años, convive con William, de 37 años. Ambos tienen una hermosa hija; Claudia, de 15 años de edad. En unión familiar ellos vive en casa de sus padres, ubicada en la comunidad de Palca. El trabajo al que se dedica, está hermosa mujer; es la venta de flores en las variedades de gladiolo, alhelí e iris; los que compra al por mayor y menor, para luego revenderlos en la capital a los intermediarios que distribuyen las flores en todo el país. Las épocas donde vende más son los días festivos como: día de la madre, navidad, año nuevo. Pues según afirma ya tiene 2 años dedicándose a ello, donde genera un promedio de mil a 2 mil nuevos soles en ganancias al mes, producto de los viajes que realiza 3 veces a la semana. Por ello más adelante quiere comenzar con los papeles necesarios para poder exportar las hermosas flores que crecen en Perú, con ello piensa mejorar sus ingresos y por ende tener una mejor calidad de vida. Esta es el segundo crédito con MFP, y se siente dichosa por todo el apoyo que recibe en su banco comunal, donde cada día aprende a progresar y salir adelante. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará más flores, para llevar a vender a la capital, donde podrá aumentar su capital.
texts.en:
Gloria is 31 years old.  She lives with her partner, 37 year-old William.  They both have a beautiful daughter, 15 year-old Claudia.  They live together as a family in her parents' house which is in the town of Palca.  This beautiful woman's business is selling flowers.  She sells gladioli, wallflowers and irises.  She buys them both wholesale and retail and then re-sells them in the capital to middlemen who distribute them all over the country.

The periods when Gloria sells the most flowers are holidays such as Mother's Day, Christmas and New Year.  She says that she has been in this business for 2 years and she makes on average 1,000 to 2,000 Peruvian soles profit a month as a result of the trips which she makes three times a week.  For this reason, in the future she would like to start getting together the necessary paperwork which will enable her to export the beautiful flowers that grow in Peru.  In this way she plans to improve her income and, consequently, enjoy a better quality of life.

This is Gloria's second loan with MFP and she feels fortunate for the support that she has received from her community bank where every day she learns to make progress and get ahead.  She will use her loan to buy more flowers to take and sell in the capital city where she will be able to increase her capital.

loans.use: To buy more flowers wholesale to take to the capital

loans.name: Duo Solidario La Union Group

texts.es:
DUO   LA UNION
Se integra por  2 señoras , la representante la señora Lilian Antonieta T. P. de 34 años de edad , tiene3 hijos  su negocio lo inicio hace 4 años   con la ayuda del esposo empezaron con el préstamo de maquinas industriales para la elaboración de ropa de variedad en la cual confeccionan   camisas, pantalones y playeras, hace un año que ella  empezó a comprar sus propias maquinas  industriales  y contratar más personal para su pequeña Fabrica que se encuentra ubicada en su domicilio, para estas temporadas invierten más por lo que muchas personas buscan  fabricación de ropa, su  sueño es poder comprar más herramientas para  negocio la señora solicita el crédito para  poder confeccionar  mas ropa en diversidad, la señora Josefina Guamuch, tiene 4 hijos todos mayores de edad   inicio con una venta de tortilla hace 10 años  lo cual vendía hasta hace 2 años inicio con la confeccion de ropa  con la ayuda de su hijo quien le proporciono maquinas para que ella pueda administrar el pequeño taller ella consiguió personal quien le apoyara, y así mismo ella sale todos los fines de semana a vender a diferentes pueblos. Su deseo es poder tener un pequeño local  en su domicilio. Solicita el préstamo para confección de ropa.
texts.en:
DUO LA UNION is a group of two ladies.  The group's representative is Mrs Lilian Antonieta T. P. who is 34 years old and has 3 children.  She started her business 4 years ago.  She set up her business with her husband's help.  They hired industrial machines to make clothes and they make shirts, pants and t-shirts.  One year ago Lilian began to buy her own industrial machines and hire more staff for her small factory which is located in her home.  In this season, they invest more as more people want clothes making.  Lilian's dream is to be able to buy more tools for her business.  She is requesting this loan so that she can make a greater variety of clothes.

Mrs Josefina Guamuch has 4 grown-up children.  She started out selling tortillas 10 years ago.  She did this up until 2 years ago when she started making clothes with the help of her son who provided her with machines so that she could run her small workshop.  She contracted staff who could support her in her work and she goes out every weekend to sell her clothes in different towns.  Her wish is to be able to have a small premises in her home.  She is requesting this loan to make clothes.

loans.use: Confeccion y venta de ropa.

loans.name: Lass Muñecas Group

texts.es:
Este grupo se llama Lass Muñecas. Está ubicado en el Estado de Tlaxcala. El grupo está conformado por 10 integrantes.  

Eloy M.S es la presidente del grupo. Tiene 25 años, estudió hasta el  3 año  de bachiller  se dedica a la elaboración de manualidades de temporada, tiene en total 2 hijos; 1 mujer y 1varon.  Ella se dedica a elaborar diseños de papel con figuritas de temporada,  vende en diferentes poblaciones que inició hace 7 años. Solicita el préstamo para compra de materia prima como pinturas y tela  .Sus clientes son el público en general.  Al momento de solicitar este préstamo se siente entusiasmada con muchas ganas de tener éxito en este fin de año en sus ventas.   Quiere este crédito para la compra de pinturas, tela, listones pegamento y silicón, ya que debe de tener todo lo que necesitará para el tipo de figura que pida el cliente.   También espera con este préstamo obtener mejores ganancias y así  más clientes ya que con eso le permitirá  tener una mejor calidad de vida para su familia con esta venta de temporada navideña.
texts.en:
This group is called 'Las  Muñecas' (The Dolls).  It is located in the State of Tlaxcala and has 10 members.

Eloy M.S. is the group's president.  She is 25 years old and studied up to the third year of high school.  She makes seasonal handicrafts.  She has 2 children; one girl and one boy.  She makes paper designs of seasonal characters.  She sells her products in different towns and has been doing this for 7 years.  She is requesting a loan to buy raw materials such as paint and fabric.  Her customers are the general public.  As she requests this loan, Eloy is feeling enthusiastic and has a great desire to be successful with her sales during this end-of-year period.  She would like this loan to buy paints, fabric, ribbons, glue and silicon adhesive since she would like to have everything that she needs for the type of figure that her customers request.  She also hopes to use this loan to obtain better profits and more customers during this Christmas sales period since this will enable her to provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: To invest in her business during the Christmas season

loans.name: Zenobio

texts.es: Zenobio, de 69 años, es un hombre soltero y trabajador, que vive junto a su hermana Carmen, una devota de la iglesia cristiana. En unión familiar ellos viven en su casa propia ubicada en la localidad de Palca. La siembra de arveja, papa, verduras y hortalizas; son los principales sembríos de Zenobio, ya tienen 7 años dedicándose a este noble trabajo de la agricultura. La dedicación y buen trato a la tierra, le proporciona buenas cosechas, por ello los comerciantes mayoristas del mercado central de Tarma, le suministran buenas ganancias. Según menciona los días, miércoles, viernes, y domingos, son los días que más demanda tiene su producción. Por ello más adelante desea abrir un comercio de comestibles, al por mayor donde venda arroz, azúcar, aceite y demás cosas por sacos. Este es el primer crédito con MFP, y espera salir adelante con el apoyo de su banco comunal; que son personas honestas, responsables y sobre todo cumplidas. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará 4 bolsas de semilla de alverjas, que sembrará en sus más de 4 hectáreas de terrenos agrícolas.
texts.en:
Zenobio is 69 years old.  He is a single and hard-working man who lives with his sister Carmen who is a devout christian.  They live together in their own home which is in the town of Palca.  Zenobio is a farmer and his main crops are peas, potatoes, greens and vegetables.  He has been in the noble work of farming for 7 years.  His commitment and the good care he takes of his land have provided him with good harvests which means that the wholesale merchants in the central market in Tarma provide him with good profits.

Zenobio says that Wednesdays, Fridays and Sundays are his busiest days.  For this reason, in future he would like to open a food store where he can sell rice, sugar, oil and sacks of other foodstuffs wholesale.

This is Zenobio's first loan from MFP and he hopes to get ahead with the support of his community bank.  The other members of his bank are honest, responsible and, above all, punctual.  He will use his loan to buy 4 bags of pea seeds which he will sow on his land which extends to more than 4 hectares.

loans.use: To buy 4 bags of pea seeds

loans.name: Las Estrellas Group

texts.es:
El Banco comunal LAS ESTRELLAS, es su primera secuencia, está formado por 10 clientes, 9 mujeres y 1 varón, la mayoría de las socias pertenecen a la Zona de Alto Pacasa, Las socias se dedican a la venta de diversos productos como ser, venta de comida, ropa cosméticos, venta de dulces y otros. Son integrantes nuevas que por primera vez ingresan a obtener un crédito de la institución. Asistieron a todas las charlas, son organizadas y con deseos de superación.
Rossmery Es la representante, actualmente toma el cargo de la presidenta del banco se dedica a la costura de mandiles, cuenta con esta actividad hace 5 años, también trabaja en el Restaurant la Llave en el centro de la ciudad, el préstamo será destinado para la compra de tela e hilos para la costura de mandiles para su posterior venta en el mercado. Casada con el señor Marcos tienen 3 hijos. Su meta es tener un taller grande con varias maquinas de costura y formar una microempresa.
En su banco comunal se ha destacado como una líder que dirige al grupo.
Dora   Socia que asume el cargo de tesorera del banco, es una ama de casa y en sus tiempos libres trabaja como ayudante en venta de comida con sus familiares, el préstamo esta destinado a la compra de bienes para el hogar. Casada con el señor Juan que trabaja de chofer de minibús en un sindicato de la ciudad tienen 5  hijos de los cuales 2 dependen de la pareja y 3 son casados y viven en otros domicilios.
Es una de las representantes en su banco comunal, que ha colaborado en la conformación del grupo y en las verificaciones. en la fotografia una de las socias vino con su hermana.
texts.en:
The 'Las Estrellas' (Stars) community bank is in its first loan cycle.  It has ten members; nine women and one man.  The majority of the members live in Alto Pacasa district.  The members sell a variety of products such as food, clothes, cosmetics, sweets, etc.  They are new members who are applying for their first loan from our institution.  They have attended all the talks, they are organized and they have a desire to succeed.

Rossmery is the group's representative.  She is currently the bank's president and her business is sewing aprons.  She has been in this business for 5 years.  She also works in La Llave Restaurant in the center of town.  Her loan will be used to buy fabric and threads for sewing her aprons which she will then sell in the market.  Rossmery is married to Marcos and they have three children.  Her goal is to have a big workshop with several sewing machines and to create a small business.  She has stood out in her community bank as being a leader of the group.

Dora is the bank's treasurer.  She is a housewife and in her spare time she works as an assistant, selling food with her family members.  Her loan will be used to buy goods for her home.  She is married to Juan who works as a minibus driver as a member of a union in the city.  They have five children, two of whom are still financially dependent on their parents and three of whom are married and live in their own homes.

Dora is one of the community bank's representatives who worked on setting the group up and on carrying out the necessary checks.  In the photo, one of the members brought her sister along.

loans.use: To buy fabric and threads for making aprons

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy 15 sacks of flour; sugar, yeast and salt

loans.name: Duo Solidario Ruth Group

texts.es:
GRUPO SOLIDARIO RUTH
Es  conformado por doña María del Carmen C. C. D. 30 años D. edad tiene 4 hijos y venD. ropa para niños, en forma ambulante  DesD. hace 6 años, con su trabajo ha poyado a su esposo y han salido adelante, ella solicita el crédito para compra D. ropa  también esta doña Marta T. H. D. 33 años D. edad tiene 3 hijos y es dueña D. una venta D. peces y canarios, palomas cantoras y jaulas, desD. hace 8 años, ella nos cuenta que necesita este crédito para   comprar más animalitos y   comida para los animalitos ya que a veces se queda sin alimentos y la gente busca, entonces ella quiere surtir su negocio, porque su clientela la busca ella espera que Fape pueda darle la oportunidad que  está esperando y poder crecer con su negocio ya que es la única en su localidad, que  se dedica a esta actividad con los peces,  quieren seguir apoyando a sus  esposos y como toda familia estar bien económicamente.
OPA
texts.en:
Ruth' Solidarity Group
This group has two members.  María del Carmen C. C. is 30 years old and has 4 children.  She sells children's clothes as a street trader.  She has been in this business for 6 years and her work has helped her to support her husband and get ahead in life.  She is requesting this loan to buy clothes.

Marta T. H. is 33 years old.  She has 3 children and owns a business selling fish, canaries, singing doves and cages.  She has had this business for 8 years.  She tells us that she needs this loan to buy more animals and feed for the animals since sometimes she doesn't have animal feed in stock but people come looking for it.  She would therefore like to stock her business so that she has what her customers are looking for.  She hopes that Fape can give her the opportunity that she has been hoping for and that she can grow in her business since she is the only one in her town that is in this business with fish.  The two women would like to continue supporting their husbands and, like any family, they would like to be financially secure.

loans.use: To buy clothes and to buy canaries

loans.name: Juan Alejo

texts.es: El señor Juan tiene 4 hijos que son menores de edad y él se hace cargo de ellos. Cabe señalar que sus productos algunas veces los compra en Managua al por mayor para obtener mejores precios y obtener mayores ganancias. Don Juan dio inicio a su negocio hace 6 años, buscando una fuente alternativa de ingresos para brindarle manutención a su familia. Poco a poco fue haciéndose de inventario y fue de esta manera que consiguió sus clientes que ahora solicitan pedidos grandes. Este crédito será invertido en la compra de mayor cantidad de mercancías, ya que desea surtir con una mejor variedad de productos para ofrecer distintas mercancías en la búsqueda de vender más pues se acerca una buena temporada.
texts.en: Juan has four dependent children who he takes care of.   He sometimes buys his products in Managua wholesale so that he can obtain better prices and better profits.  Juan started his business 6 years ago, looking for an alternative source of income to support his family.  Little by little he added inventory and attracted customers who now make large orders with him.  This loan will be invested in buying a larger quantity of merchandise since he would like to stock his business with a better variety of products to offer different merchandise.  He is looking to sell more since a good season is approaching.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy 150 cones of wool

loans.name: Juana Francisca

texts.es: La señora Juana Francisca T. tiene la edad de 48 años es casada y son su esposo habitan en el Barrio Pablo Calero, el señor labora como vigilante, tienen 6 hijos mayores de edad, de los cuales solo algunos están casados y el resto estudia y trabajan sobreviviendo de manera independiente apoyándole a sus padres con una ayuda económica a sus gastos mensuales, ella es agricultora desde hace mas de 31 años, ha sido casi una vida de dedicarse a esta actividad, uno de los principales ideas para evolucionar en el negocio ha sido la diversificación de los cultivos con otros que tengan un buen consumo, es para los terrenos que solicita un préstamo para realizar un mantenimiento Fito Sanitario, que mejore la calidad de las tierras y produzca una mejor cosecha, que beneficie los niveles de producción y el incremento de los volúmenes de ventas, para una mejora continua de las condiciones de vida en la que actualmente habitan que ha venido mejorando con otros prestamos que han solicitado, el esfurzo lo realizan para remodelar su casita para una  jubilación en una vivienda digna.
texts.en: Señora Juana Francisca T. is 48 and married. She and her husband live in Barrio Palblo Calero.  The mister works as a security guard and they have six older children.  Only some of them are married and the rest study and work, surviving on their own and helping to support their parents economically with their monthly bills.  She has been a farmer for more than 31 years, practically her whole life.  One the major ideas for working on her business has been to diversify her crops with ones that sell well.  It's for the earth that she is taking out a loan, so she can do some soil analysis witch will improve the quality of the earth and produce a better harvest, which will benefit the production levels and the growth and volume of sales.  This will continue improving the conditions of their life today, which has been improving due to other loans they have taken out.  The would like to try to remodel their home to retire in a dignified home.

loans.use: Soil analysis.

loans.name: Franklin Antonio

texts.es: El señor Franklin Antonio S. H., tiene la edad de 42 años vive en el Reparto Juan Ramón Padilla, es casado. El y su esposa laboran como vendedores ambulantes, y sus ingresos son las únicas fuentes de ingresos que posee la familia, ellos tiene 3 hijos de los cuales 2 de ellos son mayores de edad que se dedican a estudiar su profesión y un pequeño que cursa el preescolar, ellos habitan en una humilde vivienda que con su esfuerzo propio han logrado mejorar y es ahora para su hogar que solicitan un préstamo para la compra de materiales de construcción que les permitan remodelar la sala-cocina de su casa, es para ellos una necesidad debido a que sus hijos estudian y se esparcen en este espacio de la casa, y quieren crear optimas condiciones cómodas para su mejor vivir.
texts.en: Mr. Franklin Antonio S. H., who is 42 years old, lives in the area of Juan Ramón Padilla, and is married. He and his wife work as traveling salesmen, and their incomes are the only source of money that the family has. They have three children. Two of them are older in age and are studying their profession. One is small and attends preschool. They live in a humble home that with their own efforts has been improved. They are now asking for a loan to buy construction materials so that they can remodel the living room/dining room of their house. For them, this room is a necessity. Their children study and relax in this room. They want to create the best, comfortable conditions to be able to live better.

loans.use: To remodel his living room.

loans.name: Jaqueline Del Carmen

texts.es: La señora Jaqueline del Carmen G. R.,  tiene la edad de 40 años, casada y su esposo labora como chofer, apoyándole en los gastos que incurre la familia, ellos tienen 2 hijos adolecentes que actualmente estudian la escuela secundaria, ella es vendedora ambulante desde hace mas de 6 años que labora en esta actividad el cual le brinda un buen sustento económico ellos habitan en un humilde barrio el cual su población se ve afectada debido a que no les abastece el liquido vital de vida (agua), afectando de sobremanera sus vidas diarias, es para su vivienda que solicita un préstamo para la edificación de un muro de división en la sala de su hogar, y a futuro espera tener los recursos para comprar un tanque de agua que asegure el consumo de su familia, es por sus hijos que están por ingresar a la universidad que solicita este préstamo para su mejor esparcimiento, comodidad y desarrollo de sus vidas.
texts.en:
40-year old Señora Jaqueline del Carmen G. R. is married. Her husband works as a driver and helps support the family. They have two teenage children who attend high school. Jaqueline has sold her products in the street for more than six years, and this brings in a good income. 

The family lives in a modest neighbourhood where the inhabitants suffer from a lack of water which greatly affects their daily lives. Jaqueline is seeking a loan to build a dividing wall in the living room of her house. In the future she hopes to have enough money to buy a water tank so her family can always have a supply of water. Her children are about to enter university, and it is for their comfort and quality of life that she is seeking a loan.

loans.use: renovate her living room

loans.name: Mrs. Iem Chroeb Village Bank Group

texts.en:
Fiften people from Spueu village in Takeo province are making up this village bank loan. Mrs. Iem C. is the leader who has been selected by the other members for this loan.  The members will use their portion of the loan for different purposes to improve their family living. 

Mrs. Iem C. is a farmer who owns a small piece of land to grow rice to sell to support her family.  She also sells noodles to earn more income to support her family. Although she tries to work a lot, she earns only a little income. So to improve her family's living, Mrs. Iem C. is seeking a loan to buy a cow for breeding to start a new business. She is a widow with a child who is too young to work or study.

loans.use: To buy a cow for breeding

loans.name: Mrs. Hem Yeun Village Bank Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Hem Y. is the leader of this village bank loan, who has been selected by eleven people in Boeng Tumnob village in Takeo province.  The members of  this village bank loan will use their portion of the loan for different purposes. 

She and her husband, Mr. Chhuy Khat, are farmers who own a three-hectare plot of land to grow rice to sell to support their family.
